preqs: Students must have passed MKW1120 or MKG1120 before undertaking this unit.

rules.ruleString: Must have passed 1 (I/W) units in {MKB1200, MKG1120, MKP1120, MKW1120} with grades other than {STANDARD-DEF, STANDARD-NS}
Unit was previously coded {GBU3410, GBU3410H, GBU3410S, MKF3531, MKG3444, MKG3444H, MKG3444S, MKW3444}

description: The unit covers environmental factors affecting international marketing, the field of international business, international marketing research and marketing decisions, entry strategies, marketing planning, controlling and strategy for international business.
